data.actual_result: User speaks with 100% volume and muted icon
data.expected_result: User is still muted or has same volume as you set before
data.short_description: Discord ignores users volume / "Muted" option after rejoining VC
data.steps_to_repro: - Join VC with musicbot / any user that speaks - Mute / change volume of speaking user - Rejoin voice channel (restart / leave-join VC)
